title: Swap the displayed names for Saloni Singh and Sumit Shrivastav in the Our Team section

requirements.text: In the Home page “Our Team” section (frontend/src/components/FoundersSection.tsx), swap the displayed name labels so that the first card (the one currently using the Sumit photo configuration) displays “Saloni Singh” and the second card (the one currently using the Saloni photo configuration) displays “Sumit Shrivastav”. Change names only; do not change photos, roles, ordering, or any other content.

quotes: Saloni Singh and Sumit Shrivastav replace them with each other's position just replace names

acceptanceCriteria: The first (left-most) team card displays the name text exactly: “Saloni Singh”.
The second (middle) team card displays the name text exactly: “Sumit Shrivastav”.
The avatar images/photo IDs, fallbackImage paths, roles (e.g., “Co-founder”), and card ordering remain unchanged; only the displayed names are swapped.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutable paths.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change or regenerate any images.
Do not change the order of the team cards or the underlying photo mappings (founder_saloni vs founder_sumit).
Do not change roles/titles (e.g., “Co-founder”) or add new team members.
